reviews.review_msg: He does not seem to be a reasonable person. He gives way too many readings that no one has time to read. For one week he'll assign 5 books from the library and a couple of online articles, for example. He wants to fit so much into the course that there is no way to get any depth of understanding from his lectures, and like I said, you can't possibl
Challenging course.  Very clear instructor but not a course you can slack in.  Worthwhile.

A great prof who makes his course a lot of fun.  Kind of run like a high school class, which is annoying to some but I appreciate his laid back humor.  More importantly, he ran a great course on the Environment and Development and used great examples.  Definitely recommend and hope he is teaching in the Fall.
